        public static java.lang.String toCamelCase(java.lang.String s)
        驼峰命名法工具
        返回:
        toCamelCase("hello_world") == "helloWorld" toCapitalizeCamelCase("hello_world") == "HelloWorld" toUnderScoreCase("helloWorld") = "hello_world"

      • toCapitalizeCamelCase

        public static java.lang.String toCapitalizeCamelCase(java.lang.String s)
        驼峰命名法工具
        返回:
        toCamelCase("hello_world") == "helloWorld" toCapitalizeCamelCase("hello_world") == "HelloWorld" toUnderScoreCase("helloWorld") = "hello_world"

      • toUnderScoreCase

        驼峰命名法工具
        返回:
        toCamelCase("hello_world") == "helloWorld" toCapitalizeCamelCase("hello_world") == "HelloWorld" toUnderScoreCase("helloWorld") = "hello_world"

      • jsGetVal

        public static java.lang.String jsGetVal(java.lang.String objectString)
        转换为JS获取对象值，生成三目运算返回结果
        参数:
        objectString - 对象串 例如：row.user.id 返回：!row?'':!row.user?'':!row.user.id?'':row.user.id
